author: Dr. Laura Mulvey
title: I’m a Doctor Recovering From COVID-19. I Can’t Get Over the Government’s Callousness for Human Life
description: A doctor recovering from COVID-19 says the government isn't doing enough to protect health care workers.
content: Dr. Laura Mulvey, 33, practices emergency medicine at Maimonides Medical Center in Brooklyn, New York. After spending six days receiving treatment in her own hospital, she is now recovering at home from what is presumed to be COVID-19, though her test was inc… [+7196 chars]
